name: CS175 Final Project
description:
A demo exploring particle systems, decals, wind zones, and lighting in Unity 3D.

*Updated some sprite masks in Room 2 to fit the room better.

Up arrow/‘W’ - Walk forward

Left arrow/‘A’ - Walk left

Down arrow/‘S’ - Walk backward

Right arrow/‘D’ - Walk right

Space bar - Jump

Left Shift -  Hold down to walk faster

Left Mouse Click - Hold down to pick up sphere

Right Mouse Click - Throw sphere while holding it
